file_content.text: Vala! Help! Someone is trying to kill me! Vala?
Wait! Don't shoot! I'm not who you think I am! Look! See?
You've got three seconds to tell me where the real duke is.
Where is he?
It's okay, Muriel, there is no point maintaining this farce any longer.
The duke's... a duchess?
You're a woman?
Not exactly.
Looks like the calvary finally arrived.
Whoa, that's a lot of guys.
Don't be alarmed.
Guess nobody told you the bait gets eaten.
Tricking me was a bad idea.
No, no, please! Don't!
It's a trap!
Boss, behind us!
Take him down!
Take her down!
Hold your fire! There has been enough needless killing today.
This is a misunderstanding. I'm sure we can reach an agreement without further bloodshed.
This isn't about money. The duke's gotta die.
Not likely.
I'll hear you out.
The impersonator you've been chasing is Lady Muriel Corwin, the duke's sister.
You show me the duke or I blow her head off. It's that simple.
There's nothing to understand.
Tell him the truth, Vala! I don't want to die!
Tell her the truth, Vala! I don't want to die!
If you want to see the duke, you need only look there.
The real Duke Corwin died almost a month ago while visiting to negotiate a treaty.
Even using kolto suspension, our attempts to revive him have ultimately failed. All we've managed to do is delay his bodily death.
I need that body.
Hand him over.
Doesn't explain why you've got his sister running around as a decoy.
What's with the disguise then?
Duke Corwin promised he'd rally nobles loyal to him to Organa's side, but his death dashed any hope of those alliances.
Lady Corwin agreed to help us and her... strong family resemblance, allowed her to make a convincing double for her brother.
If I'd known it was that easy... my double cost me a Hutt's fortune.
She does kinda have a case of the howling uglies.
We sent her to House Rist to maintain the illusion that the Durasteel Duke was alive and well until she finished negotiating those alliances.
That's gonna be tough once I claim my bounty.
Word's about to get out.
That's true, but we could continue our ruse until you confirm Duke Corwin's death.
You may as well have put a blaster to her head yourself.
And almost got her killed.
We never imagined someone could harm her while under the protection of House Rist.
Weren't the thousand attempts on his life a clue this was a bad idea?
That was stupid.
Duke Corwin's arrangement with House Rist had never failed him before.
I was beginning to think I wouldn't have the pleasure of killing him myself.
Thanks for saving him for me.
The idea of giving this poor man to you repulses me, but I don't suppose you could do him anymore harm.
Since you're more than capable of taking Duke Corwin from us, we won't resist under two conditions.
Leave peacefully, and speak nothing of this deception to anyone.
Hmm, free money or blood money. Life's always full of tough decisions.
Looks like we're finally catching a lucky break.
Will you agree to those terms?
The duke's the only reason I'm here. Keep your word and I walk out nicely.
Deal.
I'd rather rack up my bonus kills.
Peace doesn't pay. [Kill them]
I'll be right behind you. All the way to the bank.
Come on, boss, are we really so hard up for cash you've got to kill everybody you see?
Money doesn't grow on trees, Mako. It grows on nobles.
No, please, no! Ah!
Open fire!
Lady, I'm getting paid by the corpse unless you've got a better offer.
Sweeten the deal.
Take this, then. It's half of what I will send you, provided I never see you again.
He's yours, bounty hunter. Just go in peace.
Goodbye, brother. You... you make sure he gets a proper burial.
Help! Help me, please!
It's him! He's here! Stop him!
It's her! She's here! Stop her!
Where's Vala? I need her! Oh! He's coming!
Where's Vala? I need her! Oh! She's coming!
